item.title: The Greenwashing of Exercise
item.description: This post is cross-published on my coaching blog, Warrior Spirit Movement. Most mornings, I head out into the mountains, not to hike, but to ramble. I go where my heart leads me, over rocks, up trees, through fields. And when I am on the trail, I move over it in my own way, hopping from rock to rock or crawling along past wary hikers and excited dogs. Moving in these ways has me sprinting, swinging, scrambling, leaping, reaching, and everything but â€œHiking.
